message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to let it go for a steal. I'm offering it to you for $90.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value you see in the product, but I think I can get it elsewhere for a bit less. I'd like to counter with an offer of $85.

Hi Bob, thank you for your counteroffer. I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I still think my initial offer was a great value. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. I'll counter with an offer of $87.50. It's a one-time deal, and I think it's a fair compromise.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise. I think we're getting closer to a fair price. I would like to counter with an offer of $86.

Hi Bob, I'm glad we're still in the game! I understand you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm not willing to go below $88. It's still a great value, and I think it's worth it. I'll meet you halfway again, though. I'll counter with an offer of $87.25. It's my final offer, so I hope you'll consider it.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your efforts to find a middle ground. I would like to counter with an offer of $86.50.
Hi Bob, I'm not willing to go above $88, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll counter with an offer of $87.75. This is my final offer, so I hope you'll consider it.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your last offer. I would like to counter with an offer of $87.
Hi Bob, I'm not willing to go below $88, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll counter with an offer of $87.10. This is my final offer, so I hope you'll consider it.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your final offer. I would like to counter with an offer of $87.
